While overseeing renovations to her beach house in 1970s Chile, Carmen’s quiet life is upended when a priest asks her to hide a wounded fugitive. As she steps beyond her quiet life, Carmen is pulled into the undercurrents of a politically tumultuous Chile.

programme.title: A Son
programme.desc: A family’s holiday in Tunisia ends in disaster, when their 10-year-old son Aziz is shot during a terrorist ambush. At the hospital where Aziz is in desperate need of a transplant, the family discovers a long-buried secret.

programme.title: Aurora
programme.desc: In this black comedy, a sanatorium isolated in the mountains becomes a microcosm of Kyrgyzstan; its residents comprise of a tourist, a TV host, a pervert, Chinese businessmen and drugged-up youths. Excised in linear time, reality dissolves into fantasy.

programme.title: Black Snow
programme.desc: Gosha is a trucker in northern Yakutia, who supplies his community with food, alongside low quality vodka which contributes to their alcoholism. When his truck breaks down during one of his trips, he finds himself alone in the wilderness.

programme.title: Murders on the Frioul Islands
programme.desc: When a renowned editor is found dead on stage during a play, young Captain Victor Mariani is put in charge of the case. But tensions rise and secrets surface when his father Pierre, a retired commissioner and old friend of the victim, joins the case.

programme.title: Bluebird
programme.desc: In small town Maine, a school bus driver becomes distracted during her end-of-day inspection and fails to notice a sleeping boy in the back of the bus. What happens next shatters the tranquillity of her small logging town.

programme.title: Commitment Hasan
programme.desc: Farmer Hasan is at a crossroads between challenges and new opportunities. A high-voltage mast can end up in the middle of his fertile and cultivated land. But can this invasion of modernity be resolved now that the neighbouring plot is for sale?

programme.title: For A Moment, Forever
programme.desc: A young popstar overwhelmed by fame meets a troubled ex-rocker teaching music to adolescents at a therapy centre. Both longing for love, they get closer as affection for music connects them, but shall they overcome the burdens of his past?

programme.title: Deserted
programme.desc: While on assignment to the Sinai coast, Swedish photojournalist Ingrid is kidnapped by a group of Palestinian men and hidden in the desert. An unlikely love affair arises between Ingrid and one of her captors, Ali.

programme.title: Patchwork Family
programme.desc: Christian is a divorced father who can only see his young daughter Vanessa every other weekend. When he meets the single mother Christine and decides to participate in a summer TV show, his whole life is turned upside down.

While overseeing renovations to her beach house in 1970s Chile, Carmen’s quiet life is upended when a priest asks her to hide a wounded fugitive. As she steps beyond her quiet life, Carmen is pulled into the undercurrents of a politically tumultuous Chile.

programme.title: Sarah Kohr: Ghosts Of The Past
programme.desc: Ex-gang leader Degen escapes prison after 19 years, putting inspector Sarah Kohr and prosecutor Anton Mehringer in danger. Unable to count on the authorities without risking their secrets, they must confront their pasts when Degen kidnaps Anton's son.

programme.title: La La La at Rock Bottom
programme.desc: After his release from prison, Shigeo loses his memory in a brutal attack. Taken in by Kasumi, he becomes the lead singer of a band and lives a new life- until memories of his dark past begin to return.

programme.title: Murder Up North: Sievers And the Black Angel
programme.desc: An attendee of an angel seminar has been found beaten to death. The case becomes personal for Sievers when suspicions fall on fellow participant Hanne Wegener whom he knows from his past. Feldmann has no choice but to conduct the investigation undercover.

programme.title: Pure White
programme.desc: Vural, a husband and a father who was raised in faith, leads a seemingly pious and conformist life. Yet, everything takes a sudden dark turn when he learns a truth that will force him to confront his views on religion and morality.

programme.title: Just For Laughs Gags S24 - EP 5
programme.desc: Just For Laughs will tickle everyone's funny bone with its hilarious practical jokes, hidden camera pranks, and other creative hijinks.

programme.title: Talking Point - EP 14
programme.desc: Amid a spate of unprecedented closures, Diana Ser finds out what’s really eating Singapore’s F&B businesses, and is our local food culture at stake?

programme.title: On The Red Dot - EP 16
programme.desc: Thomas never planned to hawk soup, but he carries his grandfather’s legacy at Koh Brother Pig’s Organ Soup. As costs soar and family time shrinks, can he keep the Bib Gourmand alive?

programme.title: Arts 21 - EP 414
programme.desc: ARTS 21 is an arts magazine show focusing on the latest news and events on the culture scene.

programme.title: Euromaxx - EP 414
programme.desc: Everything you've ever wanted to know about Europe - from traditions and habits to culture shocks and record breakers.

programme.title: Lingo UK S3 - EP 26
programme.desc: Lingo is the fast paced word-play game that keeps on innovating for new audiences, with its mix of skill, tension, humour and the chance to win big cash prizes. Teams are pitted against each other in a battle to fill in the blanks and find words.

programme.title: Cooking Up A Fortune - EP 13
programme.desc: Brand new series where the UK's most passionate cooks get a once-in-a-lifetime chance to launch their own food brand to the British public. Cooking Up a Fortune sees amateur foodies, who dream of escaping the rat race and cooking for a living, create and sell their dishes to hundreds of real diners in a purpose-built food arena. Each week the winning kitchen gets to launch their idea for a food business to paying customers in one of Europe's busiest food markets.

programme.title: The Great British Bake Off Series 11: An Extra Slice - EP 3
programme.desc: Each week, BAFTA-winning comedian Jo Brand shines a light on all the goings on from inside the tent. With the help of a celebrity panel, Jo serves up an extra helping of unseen moments, as well as devouring the tasty offerings brought in by the studio audience. Jo and her panel are also joined by the latest baker to leave to get all the gossip from their time on the show. And Tom Allen appears as a regular guest, reviewing audience members' bakes.

programme.title: Hiccup And Sneeze S3 - EP 11
programme.desc: Hiccup and Sneeze are two young forest monsters that snuck in one day out of the rain. They are a brother and sister, who liked the place so much they decided to stay. (Monsters sometimes do that and it's not even considered rude - but that's just monsters). Anyway, they're all living together in Bibi's magical house even though sometimes Hiccup and Sneeze don't really understand that being a monster and being a human are two very different things...

programme.title: Club M.A.G.I.C - EP 1
programme.desc: A mini-crisis in the form of bored children kickstarts Miss P's mission to make learning fun. Didi, Rhythm Princess suggests that they have a learning party since everyone enjoys a party. Miss P mobilizes her Positive Agents - Didi, Ling and Sham - to seek out fun ways to learn about the world around them. The LETTER OF THE DAY begins a journey down the alphabet trail with the first letter 'a'. The words featured are apple, abacus and aeroplane.

programme.title: 123 Number Squad S1 - EP 16
programme.desc: Aamil wants to help Lux upgrade his peaceful oasis as he feels it is only a 4 out of 10 presently. With the Number Squad's help, Aamil finds the best ways to improve its score to a perfect 10. Shelly and Captain Redbeard found the Golden Conch at the same time and are squabbling over who gets to keep it. The squad suggests settling the score with a little competition.

programme.title: Bluebird
programme.desc: In small town Maine, a school bus driver becomes distracted during her end-of-day inspection and fails to notice a sleeping boy in the back of the bus. What happens next shatters the tranquillity of her small logging town.

programme.title: For A Moment, Forever
programme.desc: A young popstar overwhelmed by fame meets a troubled ex-rocker teaching music to adolescents at a therapy centre. Both longing for love, they get closer as affection for music connects them, but shall they overcome the burdens of his past?

programme.title: Patchwork Family
programme.desc: Christian is a divorced father who can only see his young daughter Vanessa every other weekend. When he meets the single mother Christine and decides to participate in a summer TV show, his whole life is turned upside down.

programme.title: Sarah Kohr: Ghosts Of The Past
programme.desc: Ex-gang leader Degen escapes prison after 19 years, putting inspector Sarah Kohr and prosecutor Anton Mehringer in danger. Unable to count on the authorities without risking their secrets, they must confront their pasts when Degen kidnaps Anton's son.

programme.title: Open Door
programme.desc: Rudina embarks on a road trip with her pregnant sister Elma back to their Albanian hometown. However, Elma is unmarried, and they need to find someone to play the part of her husband in order not to anger their traditional father.

programme.title: La La La at Rock Bottom
programme.desc: After his release from prison, Shigeo loses his memory in a brutal attack. Taken in by Kasumi, he becomes the lead singer of a band and lives a new life- until memories of his dark past begin to return.

programme.title: What's for Dinner, Mom?
programme.desc: Sisters Tae and Yo return to their childhood home and discover a box of recipes and letters from their late Japanese mother. As Tae uncovers her mother’s hidden struggles, she journeys to Taiwan to retrace her past through memory and food.

programme.title: Murder Up North: Sievers And the Black Angel
programme.desc: An attendee of an angel seminar has been found beaten to death. The case becomes personal for Sievers when suspicions fall on fellow participant Hanne Wegener whom he knows from his past. Feldmann has no choice but to conduct the investigation undercover.

programme.title: The Cuban
programme.desc: An unexpected friendship begins between an elderly Cuban musician with dementia who is brought out of his shell by his care worker, and a disillusioned young pre-med Afghan student named Mina. Through a shared love of music, both their lives are changed.

programme.title: Pure White
programme.desc: Vural, a husband and a father who was raised in faith, leads a seemingly pious and conformist life. Yet, everything takes a sudden dark turn when he learns a truth that will force him to confront his views on religion and morality.

programme.title: Forgive Me. Thank You.
programme.desc: A computer science fresh graduate finds himself unable to secure a job due to his deafness. The discrimination he faces forces him to confront his anxieties and take control of his own destiny.

programme.title: Sarah Kohr: Ghost Lights
programme.desc: In a post-pandemic Europe, conspiracy theorist Felix Morgenroth becomes obsessed with exposing the "coronavirus lie." Convinced that physicians Carsten and Lisa Kippmann were behind the conspiracy, Felix seeks retribution through a devastating explosion.

programme.title: Temporaries
programme.desc: Ariane gets a job as an interpreter at a food plant after moving back to the Richelieu Valley following a breakup. There, she finds herself torn between obeying the harsh demands of her boss and standing up for the exploited migrant workers she befriends.

programme.title: Above the Clouds
programme.desc: After losing his parents in a flood, 15-year-old Andy is forced to live in the Mountain Province with his estranged grandfather. Feeling they’ve lost everything, the two embark on a journey and start to come to terms with their grief.

programme.title: Oskar & Lilli: Where No One Knows Us
programme.desc: Chechen siblings Oskar and Lilli face deportation from Austria but are separated in foster care after their mother’s suicide attempt. Meeting in secret, the siblings hold onto hope that they will reunite as a family someday.
